org.springframework.data.rest.core.mapping

接口 ResourceMetadata

  • 所有超级接口:
    CollectionResourceMapping, ResourceMapping

    public interface ResourceMetadata
extends CollectionResourceMapping
    Interface for metadata of resources exposed throught the system.
    作者:
    Oliver Gierke

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Class<?> getDomainType()
      Returns the domain type that is exposed through the resource.
      ResourceMapping getMappingFor(<any> property)
      Returns the ResourceMapping for the given PersistentProperty or null if not managed.
      SearchResourceMappings getSearchResourceMappings()
      Returns the SearchResourceMappings, i.e. the mappings for the search resource exposed for the current resource.
      boolean isExported(<any> property)
      Returns whether the given PersistentProperty is a managed resource and in fact exported.
      boolean isManagedResource(<any> property)
      Returns whether the type of the given PersistentProperty is exposed as resource itself.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.rest.core.mapping.CollectionResourceMapping

        getSingleResourceRel

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.rest.core.mapping.ResourceMapping

        getPath, getRel, isExported

        Class<?> getDomainType()
        Returns the domain type that is exposed through the resource.

        boolean isManagedResource(<any> property)
        Returns whether the type of the given PersistentProperty is exposed as resource itself.
        参数:
        property - must not be null.
        返回:

        boolean isExported(<any> property)
        Returns whether the given PersistentProperty is a managed resource and in fact exported.
        参数:
        property - must not be null.
        返回:

        ResourceMapping getMappingFor(<any> property)

        返回:

        SearchResourceMappings getSearchResourceMappings()
        Returns the SearchResourceMappings, i.e. the mappings for the search resource exposed for the current resource.
        返回:
